original_text: Some people are trying to lead you away from God's true message. I am writing these things to you so that you know about these people.
korean_text: 너희를 미혹하는 자들에 관하여 내가 이것을 너희에게 썼노라

sentences.original_text: Some people are trying to lead you away
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 당신을 멀어지게 하려고 합니다

sentences.original_text: I am writing these things to you
so that you know about these people
